name: Joined Path
description:
NOTE: PLAY ON FULL SCREEN. The UI it's not responsive.
NOTE2: Added PC version with Ps4 Controller.

Game done at the GMTK Game jam.

In this game, you will be the main Hero of a  Party of heroes. You face one of your last tasks: Reach the Big Bad Boss at his hideout.

Reach the end of the map at the hideout of the Big Bad boss with all your party. You have done a long journey with all your party members until here.  Your fellow heroes will stand and fight if the party get caught by a minion, they'll try to buy you time. But be careful, you are not strong enough to fight the Big Bad Boss alone. Don't let your fiends, your fellow heroes, hold the line behind you. Avoid all the minions and try to reach the Big Bad Boss with all your party. As it was during all your journey. 

You started together, you will end together.

CREDITS: 

Sheik Sama (Jake Petrulla Doncel): 
Game Design, Programing, Game Mechanics, theme, dialogues

Cristina Cid : Level Designer, Sound, legs and Cuteness suport ♫

Online resources: 

Death SFX By theuncertainman

Boing SFX byTinTinOko.

Brawl SFX by Danjocross

Soundtracks by Kenney Vleugels
